title: X-Men star James McAvoy 'donates a whopping £50,000 to brave cancer suffer's life-changing charity fund'
text:
Kelly Turner with her mum and actor James McAvoy (Photo: Just Giving) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Hollywood A-lister James McAvoy appears to have made a huge donation to a brave cancer sufferer's charity fund. 
In the same week the X-Men star posed for a selfie with Kelly Turner a man, only identifying himself as James, donated £50,000 to her JustGiving page. 
He wrote on her page: "Great to meet you the other day Kelly. 
"I hope this helps you achieve your goal sooner rather than later. 
"Good luck luv James." 
The actor paid Kelly a visit on Tuesday at the Royal Marsden Hospital where he posed for a selfie with her while the pair chatted at her bedside. The generous donation, which was signed off 'Good luck luv James' (Photo: Just Giving) Kelly Turner is hoping to undergo life-changing treatment (Photo: Just Giving) 
The family need to raise £408,000 for surgery in New York, which will prolong her life by two years. 
After surgery, Kelly hopes to raise a further £500,000 to pay for cancer-busting immunotherapy. 
Kelly, a St Edmunds School pupil, was given two years to live when she was diagnosed with a desmoplastic small round cell tumour in October 2015. Kelly Turner with Ricky Wilson (Photo: Just Giving) Kelly before she became ill (Photo: Just Giving) 
The NHS refused treatment and refused to fund surgery abroad, forcing Kelly, her mum Linda and dad Martin, to fundraise on JustGiving for her treatment. 
Including the money James McAvoy has donated, the #doingitforkelly page has now raised an impressive £457,611. 
Kelly's dad, Martin Turner, was impressed with the Hollywood actor's kind approach when he visited his daughter. Including the money James McAvoy has donated, the #doingitforkelly page has now raised an impressive £457,611 (Photo: Just Giving) Kelly on her 16 birthday (Photo: Just Giving) 
He told Kent Live : "He decided to come and visit everyone and spent a lot of time talking to Kelly and the others – she managed to grab a selfie with him, so that's another celebrity she's met." Like us on Facebook
